channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Taegyun Jeon

item.title: Living Energy: distributed-intelligence management and operation for smart energy
item.description:
Sponsor: Gwangu Institute of Science and Technology (GIST)

Period: Jan 2016 - Dec 2017

Development Environment: Linux, Python

Tasks:

  • Develop perversive demand response (DR) based on Big Data analytics.
  • Optimize electricity load forecasting with energy patterns and factor diversification.
  • Drive a long-term analysis and reporting based on load forecasting and electricity consumptions.

Knowledge and Skills Linux, Python, TensorFlow, Recurrent Neural Networks, Load Forecasting, Energy Price Forecasting

Related Works

item.title: [kaggle] Digit Recognizer using Convolutional Neural Networks for MNIST dataset
item.description:
Project Information

Sponsor: Individual project

Period: May, 2016

Task:

  • Classification of images of handwritten single digit.

Related Knowledge

Digit Recognition, Computer Vision

Skills

Python, TensorFlow, Convolutional Neural Networks

Report

Detail explanations are on the project page.

Descriptions

Description and contributions

In this individual project, I show how TensorFlow can be used to implement the Convolutional Neural Networks. I introduce a short descriptions of the model, which serves both as a refresher but also as to anchor the notation and show how mathematical expressions are mapped onto TensorFlow graph.

item.title: Robust Detection of Heart Beats in Multimodal Physiological Data
item.description:
Project Information

Sponsor: System Biology Research Center (SBRC) at Gwangu Institute of Science and Technology (GIST)

Period: Jan 2014 - Dec 2015

Tasks:

  • Detect heartbeat position when ECG signal is contaminated
  • Design complementary model with the other physiological signals (EEG, EMG, EOG, Blood Pressure, Respiration, and Stroke Volume)

Related Knowledge:

Physiological Signal Processing, Wavelet Analysis, Electrocardiogram (ECG), Blood Pressure (BP), Electroencephalogram (EEG)

Skills:

C, MATLAB, WFDB (WaveForm DataBase) Software Package

Report

Descriptions

Description and contributions

In this project, I have designed and implemented an algorithm for robust heartbeat detection using a multimodal data association method supplementing ECG (being regarded as a primary input signal) with blood pressure (BP) and electroencephalogram (EEG) viewed as complementary inputs.

Screenshots

item.title: Object Recognition Algorithms using Stereo Camera

Integrated Management System of Basin Information in Yeongsan River and Seomjin River Basins
item.description:
Project Information

Sponsor: Ministry of Environment, South Korea

Period: Dec, 2006 - Aug, 2007

Tasks:

  • Development of core systems for integrating operation
  • Development of web-based core systems for integrating operation
  • Design of system for data process from real-time data of water quality and volumetric flow rate
  • Development and integration of systems

Related Knowledge

Web Mining, Basin Information, Data Visualization, Statistical Analytics

Skills

PHP, Linux, SQL, Perl, Shell Script

Report

  • “Develeopment of Integrated Management System of Basic Information in Yeongsan and Seomjin River Basins”, Basin Management Research Center, 2007. Link

Descriptions

Description and contributions

In this project, I have contributed to developed integrated system for watershed manager. In developed systems, the calibrated watershed model was applied to execute scenario analysis and various environmental information about Youngsan and Seomjin River was also implemented

  • Development of core systems for integrating operation
    • Management of user, document, file, multimedia, and network in integrating operation system
    • Design and development to set up a system environment for integration
  • Development of web-based core systems for integrating operation
    • Development of graphical user interface (GUI)
    • Use and development of interpreter/builder of web-integrating system
    • Design and development to set up a web-based system environment for integration
  • Design of system for data process from real-time data of water quality and volumetric flow rate
    • Analysis from a questionnaire of user
    • Investigation of data structure and quality credibility from real-time (raw) data
    • Investigation of data structure from observed data
    • Comparison and verification of data between real-time data and observed data
    • Construction of reliable raw data from systematic data analysis
    • Selection and development of models for data process
    • Investigation of credibility of secondary data (information)
    • Analysis and modification of errors in the models
    • Design of a system for data process
  • Development and integration of systems

Screenshots

  • Data analysis from measured water quality

  • Target basins from Yeongsan River and Seomjin River

item.title: Knowledge of Science and Technology Platform
item.description:
Project Information

Sponsor: Korea Institute of Science and Technology Information (KISTI)

Period: Jan 2006 - Dec 2006

Tasks:

  • Construction of Lexical Semantic Network for Words of General and IT Category
  • Category Tagging on Thesaurus

Related Knowledge

Ontology, Thesaurus Tagging

Skills

OWL

Report

  • “과학기술 시소러스 구축 연구 (Construction on Thesaurus of Science and Technology)”, Korea Institute of Science and Technology, 2006, (ISBN: 89-5884-663-1 93500) Link

Descriptions

Description and contributions

In this project, I have contributed to construct lexical semantic hierarchy for general and IT hierarchical categories from about 40,000 words with three other team members who tagged the thesaurus together.

Screenshots

  • Flowchart for assignment of classification codes

  • Flowchart for assignment of compound words
